work.summary: Certified Home Health Aide, Hospice/Pallative Care division
work.desc: Caring for patients who wish to spend there end of life as home.  I provide personal care to the patients, as well as a support system to the family.
I specialized in nursing facilities or day care programs for patients who had special needs or were recovering from addiction.

work.company: Cape Regional Medical Center, Cape May Court House, NJ
work.desc: As a phlebotomist I would start my day with going to various nursing homes to do blood draws at 5am.  I would then go to the hospital, drop off the specimens and go to the duty assigned for the day internally.  The departments would/could be - Emergency, Labor/Delivery, Outpatient Lab, or assigned to float the different floors and do draws as ordered.

education.studyType: NJ Certified Phlebotomist, None at the moment, but interested in furthering my education in the Healthcare Industry - LPN
